### 4. Preference Share capital history of our Company
Our Company does not have any preference share capital as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.
### 5. Equity shares issued for consideration other than cash or by way of bonus issue

We have not re-valued our assets since inception. Except as disclosed below, we have not issued any Equity Shares (including bonus shares) by capitalizing revaluation reserves for consideration other than cash, at any point of time since incorporation.
